content.text: Hey! My name is Alex, what's your name?
I'm Ryan, nice to meet you Alex!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, watch anime, and eat pasta!
That's awesome! I like video games and pasta too! I also like to go for walks with my dog Percy and design jewelry to relax.
I love Percy! My parents are allergic to cats so I've never been able to have one. What's your favorite food?
I love Italian food so I'm a big fan of pasta! What's your longest relationship?
My longest relationship was four years. How about you?
My longest relationship was two years.
That's still a long time! What do you like to do for Halloween?
I love Halloween! I'm hoping to have a spooky proposal with a lot of sci-fi and horror elements.
That sounds awesome! I love sci-fi and horror too! I'm going to a Halloween party with my friends this year.
That sounds like fun! I'm going to a party with my boyfriend and his friends.
Well I hope you have a great time at your party!
